articles.author: Catherine E. Shoichet
articles.title: How a war thousands of miles away is changing the way some Americans celebrate Hanukkah - CNN
articles.description: Hundreds of Jews shared responses with CNN about their faith, their fears and how rising antisemitism is shaping their celebration of Hanukkah this year.
articles.content:
Jean Joachims menorah has been sitting in the window of her first-floor New York City apartment for more than a decade.
She loves lighting it every year on Hanukkah, and even when the holiday has pa… [+8940 chars]
